Package com.atakmap.android.filesharing.android.service

Class DirectoryWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.FileObserver
      • com.atakmap.os.FileObserver
        • com.atakmap.android.filesharing.android.service.DirectoryWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImportListener
    public class DirectoryWatcher
extends FileObserver
implements ImportListener
    Observe changes to directory and reflect changes in a db, and optionally notify a callback listener

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectoryWatcher

        public DirectoryWatcher​(FileInfoPersistanceHelper.TABLETYPE dt,
                        java.lang.String path,
                        java.io.FileFilter filter,
                        ContentTypeMapper tm,
                        DirectoryWatcher.FileUpdateCallback cb,
                        boolean preCache,
                        boolean ignoreExistingFiles)
        ctor
        Parameters:
        path - the path to watch
        cb - callback to be triggered when a file is found
        preCache - true to iterate all files in the directory during ctor
        ignoreExistingFiles - if true, will ignore all files found in the path
